name: Fleur MCP
title: fleurmcp.com
shortDescription: Fleur MCP serves as a dedicated app store for the Claude Desktop app, allowing users to seamlessly integrate various applications without leaving their workspace. It is designed to enhance productivity by centralizing app management. Users can download and manage apps directly on macOS, benefiting from a streamlined workflow. Ideal for IT professionals and regular users who need to extend Claude's functionality with additional services.
pros: Enhances productivity by centralizing app management

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Setapp
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers a wide range of Mac apps
